Package org.graph

Class AdjMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.graph.AdjMatrix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Graph
    public class AdjMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
implements Graph
    Class representing a graph using an adjacency matrix. Implements theGraph interface for graph operations like adding/removing vertices and edges.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AdjMatrix​(int numVert, boolean isOriented)
      Constructs an adjacency matrix graph.

      • scanFromFile

        public void scanFromFile​(java.lang.String filename)
        Reads graph data from a file and updates the graph accordingly. The file should contain the number of vertices, a boolean indicating if the graph is oriented, and a list of edges (pairs of vertex numbers).
        Specified by:
        scanFromFile in interface Graph
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the file containing the graph data.
